event.description:
DINE EARLY AT SABAI THAI FOR 99QR
 
Treat your palate to a medley of Thai flavors as you indulge in an exquisite 3-course dinner for QR 99. Dine in early between 5:00pm and 7:00pm to enjoy this exclusive offer.
 
QR 99, with soft beverages
Saturday to Wednesday
 
#thaifood #earlybird #sabaithai #westindoha #westinwellfie #doha #Qatar #eatwell
event.title: Early Bird Menu

event.description:
INDULGE IN ROYAL THAI BRUNCH

Step in Sabai Thai for Saturday Brunch like no other and indulge in traditional Royal Thai Cuisine and Beverages

Every Saturday 12:00pm to 4:00pm
QR 130 per person with soft beverages
QR 245 per person with selected grapes and cocktails

SPG discount & any vouchers are not valid in this promotion
